Trgovac: Makes smiths and supply masters more cooperative and offer better equipment. (Party skill)

Every point increases maximum number of troops you can command by 5 (3 for companions), increases your party morale and coherence in battle. Makes more and stronger volunteers willing to follow you. (Personal skill)
Every level of this skill increases maximum number of prisoners by %d. Improves chances of capturing and keeping prisoners .(Leader skill)
The ability to survive in the wilderness and bend it to your will. This skill affects the party's ability to hide from the enemy, and the party's speed while in wooded terrain. (Party skill)
Heroji dobijaju 5%% helta natrag koje su izgubili tokom borbe po skilu levela. (Grupni skil)
Svaki poen ovog skila dodaje 4%% sanse da ce vas vojnik koji je smrtonosno povredjen biti ranjen umesto ubijen. (Grupni skil)
Grupno lecenje je povecano za 20%% po skilu. (Grupni skil)
Increases inventory capacity by +6 per skill level. Reduces food consumption. (Leader skill)
Grupna vidljivost je povecana za 10%% po levelu. (Grpuni skil)
Brzina na mapi je povecana za 3%% po levelu. (Grupni skil)
Improves battle advantage. Increases battle join distance for enemy parties and decreases battle join distance for friendly parties by 3% per level. (Leader skill)
Svakoga dana, svaki heroj sa ovim skilom dodaje iskustva za svakog vojnika ciji level je manji nego njegov. Iskustva po levelu idu: {0,4,10,16,23,30,38,46,55,65,80}. (Licni skil)
Increases amount and quality of loot gained after battles. (Party skill)
Povecaca snagu i preciznost strelicarstva i bacajucih oruzja kad ste na konju. (Licna vestina)
Dozvoljava jahanje konja (ili drugih cudovista) koji traze veci level i povecava brzinu jahanjai manevre. (Licni skil)
reduces damage to shields (by 8%% per skill level), improves shield speed and coverage, reduces shield penalty when used with bows. (Personal skill)
Omogucava lakse ucenje oruzja i povecava limit. Limit ide do: 60, 100, 140, 180, 220, 260, 300, 340, 380, 420.(Licni skil)
Daje mogucnost koristite jace lukove. Svaki poen ovog skila (kao i zahtev boljeg potezanje) povecava snagu luka za 14%% (Licni skil)
Svaki poen ovog skila povecava snagu bacanja za 10%% (Licni skil)
Svaki poen ovog skila povecava snagu udaranja na blizinu za 8%% (Licni skil)
Each point to this skill increases hit points by +2, and lets you shrug off some damage without being wounded. (Personal skill)
